trans-unit.source: Displays ADO.NET data in a scrollable grid.
trans-unit.target: Exibe os dados em uma grade rolável ADO.NET.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control replaces and adds functionality to the DataGrid control; however, the DataGrid control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controle substitui e adiciona a funcionalidade para o controle DataGrid; no entanto, o controle DataGrid é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores e o uso futuro, se você escolher.

trans-unit.source: The DataGrid displays Web-like links to child tables.
trans-unit.target: A grade de dados exibe links de estilo da Web para tabelas filho.

trans-unit.source: You can click on a link to navigate to the child table.
trans-unit.target: Você pode clicar em um link para navegar até a tabela filho.

trans-unit.source: When a child table is displayed, a back button appears in the caption that can be clicked to navigate back to the parent table.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma tabela filho é exibida, um botão Voltar aparece na legenda que pode ser clicada para navegar de volta para a tabela pai.

trans-unit.source: The data from the parent rows is displayed below the caption and above the column headers.
trans-unit.target: Os dados das linhas pai são exibidos abaixo da legenda e acima os cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: You can hide the parent row information by clicking the button to the right of the back button.
trans-unit.target: Você pode ocultar as informações de linha pai, clique no botão à direita do botão Voltar.

trans-unit.source: To display a table in the DataGrid at run time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> method to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> properties to a valid data source.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir uma tabela no DataGrid em tempo de execução, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>método para definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>Propriedades para uma fonte de dados válida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following data sources are valid: - A <xref:System.Data.DataTable> - A <xref:System.Data.DataView> - A <xref:System.Data.DataSet> - A <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> - A single dimension array - Any component that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface - Any component that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface For more information about the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> class, see [DataSets, DataTables, and DataViews](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: As seguintes fontes de dados são válidas:: um <xref:System.Data.DataTable>- um <xref:System.Data.DataView>- um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>- um <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>- uma matriz de dimensão única - qualquer componente que implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>interface - qualquer componente que implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IList>interface para obter mais informações sobre o <xref:System.Data.DataSet>classe, consulte [DataSets, DataTables e DataViews](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: You can create a grid that enables users to edit data but prevents them from adding new rows by using a <xref:System.Data.DataView> as the data source and setting the <xref:System.Data.DataView.AllowNew%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Você pode criar uma grade que permite aos usuários editar dados, mas impede a adição de novas linhas usando um <xref:System.Data.DataView>como a fonte de dados e a configuração de <xref:System.Data.DataView.AllowNew%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Data.DataView.AllowNew%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.source: Data sources are further managed by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects.
trans-unit.target: Fontes de dados ainda são gerenciadas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: For each table in a data source, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> can be returned from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: Para cada tabela em uma fonte de dados, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>pode ser retornado do formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can determine the number of rows contained by a data source by returning the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode determinar o número de linhas contidas por uma fonte de dados, retornando associado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>do objeto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Count%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: To validate data, use the underlying objects that represent data and their events.
trans-unit.target: Para validar dados, use os objetos subjacentes que representam dados e seus eventos.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data comes from a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> in a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, use the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> events.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se os dados vêm de um <xref:System.Data.DataTable>em um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, use o <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging>e <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging>eventos.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because the number of columns can be customized (by adding or deleting members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>) and the rows can be sorted by column, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> property values cannot be guaranteed to correspond to <xref:System.Data.DataRow> and <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> indexes in a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Porque o número de colunas pode ser personalizado (adicionando ou excluindo membros o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>) e as linhas podem ser classificadas pela coluna, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A>valores de propriedade não podem ser garantidos para corresponder ao <xref:System.Data.DataRow>e os <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>índices no <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: Therefore you should avoid using those properties in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> event to validate data.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, você deve evitar usar essas propriedades no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>evento para validar dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>

trans-unit.source: To determine which cell is selected, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar qual célula estiver selecionada, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: Change the value of any cell by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Item%2A> property, which can take either the row and column indexes of the cell, or a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>.
trans-unit.target: Altere o valor de qualquer célula usando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Item%2A>propriedade, o que pode levar os índices de linha e coluna de célula, ou um único <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: Monitor the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCellChanged> event to detect when the user selects another cell.
trans-unit.target: Monitor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCellChanged>eventos para detectar quando o usuário seleciona outra célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCellChanged>

trans-unit.source: To determine which part of the control the user clicked, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar qual parte do controle que o usuário clicou, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A>método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> object, which contains the row and column of a clicked area.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A>método retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo>objeto, que contém a linha e coluna de uma área clicada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A>

trans-unit.source: To manage the appearance of the control at run time, several properties for setting the color and caption attributes are available, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionFont%2A>, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Para gerenciar a aparência do controle em tempo de execução, várias propriedades para definir os atributos de cor e a legenda estão disponíveis, incluindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionFont%2A>e assim por diante.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionFont%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionBackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the displayed grid (or grids) can be further modified by creating <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects and adding them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>, which is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A aparência da grade exibida (ou grades) pode ser modificada mais criando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>objetos e adicioná-los para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>, que é acessado por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> containing three <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects, you can add three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the collection, one for each table.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>é definido como um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>que contém três <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objetos, você pode adicionar três <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>objetos à coleção, um para cada tabela.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: To synchronize each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> object with a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Para sincronizar a cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>objeto com um <xref:System.Data.DataTable>Defina a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>para a <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>de <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about binding to an array of objects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre associação a uma matriz de objetos, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To create a customized view of a table, create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> class and add the object to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma exibição personalizada de uma tabela, crie uma instância de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>classe e adicionar o objeto para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>acessados por meio do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: Both classes inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Ambas as classes são herdadas de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: For each column style, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a column that you want to show in the grid.
trans-unit.target: Para cada estilo de coluna, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>para o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>de uma coluna que você deseja exibir na grade.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: To hide a column, set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> to something other than a valid <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para ocultar uma coluna, defina seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>como algo diferente de <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> válido</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: To format the text of a column, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> to one of the values found in [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para formatar o texto de uma coluna, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>para um dos valores encontrados na [tipos de formatação](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [Data personalizada e cadeias de caracteres de formato de hora](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: To bind the DataGrid to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: Para associar a grade de dados em uma matriz fortemente tipada de objetos, o tipo de objeto deve conter propriedades públicas.

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> that displays the array, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `typename[]` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>que exibe a matriz, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `typename[]` onde `typename` é substituído pelo nome do tipo de objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Also note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly.
trans-unit.target: Observe também que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>propriedade diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas; o nome do tipo deve ser exatamente iguais.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property for an example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>propriedade para obter um exemplo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also bind the DataGrid to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode associar a grade de dados a um <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: A feature of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the DataGrid can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item.
trans-unit.target: Um recurso do <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>é que ele pode conter objetos de vários tipos, mas a grade de dados só pode ser associado a essa lista quando todos os itens na lista são do mesmo tipo que o primeiro item.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: Isso significa que todos os objetos devem ser do mesmo tipo, ou eles devem herdar da classe mesmo como o primeiro item na lista.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the first item in a list is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, the second item could be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o primeiro item em uma lista é uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, o segundo item pode ser um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>(que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: If, on the other hand, the first item is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, the second object cannot be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: Se, por outro lado, o primeiro item é um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>o segundo objeto não pode ser <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Further, the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must have items in it when it is bound.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>devem ter itens nele quando ele está vinculado.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> will result in an empty grid.
trans-unit.target: Vazio <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>resultará em uma grade vazia.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the objects in the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, os objetos de <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>deve conter propriedades públicas.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: When binding to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> to "ArrayList" (the type name).
trans-unit.target: Ao associar a um <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>para "ArrayList" (o nome do tipo).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: For each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>, you can set color and caption attributes that override the settings for the DataGrid control.
trans-unit.target: Para cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>, você pode definir cores e legenda atributos que substituem as configurações para o controle DataGrid.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: However, if those properties are not set, the settings for the control are used by default.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se essas propriedades não forem definidas, as configurações para o controle são usadas por padrão.

trans-unit.source: The following properties can be overridden by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AlternatingBackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderBackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.LinkColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeadersVisible%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeaderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A> To customize the appearance of individual columns, add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>, which is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> property of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades a seguir podem ser substituídas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>Propriedades:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AlternatingBackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderBackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.LinkColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeadersVisible%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeaderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A>para personalizar a aparência de colunas individuais, adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objetos ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>que é acessado por meio da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A>propriedade de cada trans-unit.source: To synchronize each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> with a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Para sincronizar cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>com uma <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>na <xref:System.Data.DataTable>Defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>para o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>de <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: When constructing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, you can also set a formatting string that specifies how the column displays data.
trans-unit.target: Ao construir um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, você também pode definir uma cadeia de caracteres de formatação que especifica como a coluna exibe dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify that the column use a short-date format to display dates contained in the table.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode especificar que a coluna usa um formato de data abreviada para exibir as datas contidas na tabela.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Sempre crie <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objetos e adicioná-los para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>antes de adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>objetos a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: Quando você adiciona um vazio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>com uma validade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>valor à coleção, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objetos são gerados automaticamente para você.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Consequentemente, uma exceção será lançada se você tentar adicionar novos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objetos com <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>valores para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> de duplicados</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control replaces and adds functionality to the DataGrid control; however, the DataGrid control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle substitui e adiciona a funcionalidade para o controle DataGrid; no entanto, o controle DataGrid é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores e o uso futuro, se você escolher.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Differences Between the Windows Forms DataGridView and DataGrid Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [as diferenças entre o DataGridView do Windows Forms e controles DataGrid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: To populate a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> property to a valid source, such as a <xref:System.Data.DataView>, <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, or <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>.
trans-unit.target: Para popular um recém-criado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controlar, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>propriedade a uma fonte válida, como um <xref:System.Data.DataView>, <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, ou <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>.</xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether navigation is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a navegação é permitida.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false`, links to child tables are not shown.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade é definida como `false`, links para tabelas filho não são mostradas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if navigation is allowed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a navegação é permitida. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation*>propriedade foi alterada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A> property is set to `false`, then no links to child tables are shown.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A>está definida como `false`, não há vínculos para tabelas filho são mostradas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the grid can be resorted by clicking on a column header.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a grade pode ser reclassificada ao clicar em um cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: This property is overridden by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property if there is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> currently in effect for the control.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é substituída pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade se não houver um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>atualmente em vigor para o controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If sorting is allowed, clicking on a column header will sort the table data by that column.
trans-unit.target: Se é permitido classificar, clique em um cabeçalho de coluna para classificar os dados da tabela por essa coluna.

trans-unit.source: You can also sort using an expression for a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode classificar usando uma expressão para <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A> for details on creating a sort expression.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A>para obter detalhes sobre a criação de uma expressão de classificação.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> is bound to a <xref:System.Data.DataView>, you can set a custom sort for the table using the <xref:System.Data.DataView> class's <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>está associado a um <xref:System.Data.DataView>, você pode definir uma classificação personalizada para a tabela usando o <xref:System.Data.DataView>da classe <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> is bound to a <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>, each table in the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> can have a custom sort by setting the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager.DataViewSettings%2A> class's <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting.Sort%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>está associado a um <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>, cada tabela no <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>pode ter uma classificação personalizada, definindo o <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager.DataViewSettings%2A>da classe <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting.Sort%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting.Sort%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataViewManager.DataViewSettings%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if columns can be sorted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as colunas podem ser classificadas; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of odd-numbered rows of the grid.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de plano de fundo de linhas ímpares da grade.

trans-unit.source: By default, both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A> and the AlternatingBackColor properties are set to the same color.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, tanto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>e as propriedades de AlternatingBackColor são definidas com a mesma cor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A> property affects only even-numbered rows, while setting the AlternatingBackColor affects only odd-numbered rows.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>propriedade afeta apenas pares de linhas, enquanto a configuração a AlternatingBackColor afeta apenas as linhas ímpares.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the alternating background color.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor de plano de fundo alternadas.

trans-unit.source: The default is the system color for windows (<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window*>).
trans-unit.target: O padrão é a cor do sistema para windows (<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window*>).</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Back" name="Back" href=""></xref> button on a child table is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref uid="langword_csharp_Back" name="Back" href=""> </xref> botão em uma tabela filho é clicado.

trans-unit.source: The `Back` button becomes visible when a child table is displayed.
trans-unit.target: O `Back` botão fica visível quando uma tabela filho é exibida.

trans-unit.source: Clicking the button will cause the grid to display the parent table.
trans-unit.target: Clicar no botão fará com que a grade exibir a tabela pai.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of even-numbered rows of the grid.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de plano de fundo das linhas pares da grade.

trans-unit.source: Whereas the BackColor property determines the color of rows in the grid, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A> determines the color of the nonrow area, which is only visible when the grid is scrolled to the bottom, or if only a few rows are contained in the grid.
trans-unit.target: Enquanto a propriedade BackColor determina a cor das linhas na grade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A>determina a cor da área de nonrow, que só é visível quando a grade é rolada na parte inferior, ou se apenas algumas linhas estão contidas na grade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, both the BackColor and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A> properties are set to the same color.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, a cor de fundo e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>propriedades são definidas para a mesma cor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the BackColor property affects only even-numbered rows, while setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A> affects only odd-numbered rows.
trans-unit.target: Configurar a BackColor propriedade afeta apenas linhas pares, ao definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>afeta linhas ímpares apenas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color of rows in the grid.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor das linhas na grade.

trans-unit.source: The default is the system color for windows (<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window*>).
trans-unit.target: O padrão é a cor do sistema para windows (<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window*>).</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the non-row area of the grid.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor da área não linha da grade.

trans-unit.source: The BackgroundColor determines the color of the nonrow area of the grid, which is only visible when no table is displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>, or if the grid is scrolled to the bottom, or if only a few rows are contained in the grid.
trans-unit.target: BackgroundColor determina a cor da área da grade, que só é visível quando nenhuma tabela é exibida por nonrow o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>, ou se a grade é rolada para a parte inferior, ou se apenas algumas linhas estão contidas na grade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color of the grid's background.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor do plano de fundo da grade.

trans-unit.source: The default is the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.AppWorkspace*> color.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é o <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.AppWorkspace*>cor.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.AppWorkspace*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor*> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor*>mudou.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não é significativo para esse controle.

trans-unit.source: The background image associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: A imagem de plano de fundo associada ao controle.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the BackgroundImageChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage%2A>propriedade não é significativa para esse controle, embora você possa alterar seu valor e manipular o evento BackgroundImageChanged para detectar a alteração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não é significativo para esse controle.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the BackgroundImageLayoutChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>propriedade não é significativa para esse controle, embora você possa alterar seu valor e manipular o evento BackgroundImageLayoutChanged para detectar a alteração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to put the grid into a state where editing is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Tenta colocar a grade em um estado em que a edição é permitida.

trans-unit.source: The grid will deny edit requests if the user already started typing into a cell.
trans-unit.target: A grade negará editar solicitações se o usuário tiver iniciado digitando em uma célula.

trans-unit.source: In that case, the BeginEdit method will return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o método BeginEdit retornará `false`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> to edit.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> to edit.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha para editar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the method is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o método for bem-sucedida; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Begins the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Começa a inicialização de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> que é usado em um formulário ou usado por outro componente.

trans-unit.source: The initialization occurs at run time.
trans-unit.target: A inicialização ocorre em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio design environment uses this method to start the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: O ambiente de design do Visual Studio usa esse método para iniciar a inicialização de um componente que é usado em um formulário ou por outro componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A> method ends the initialization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A>método termina a inicialização.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the BeginInit and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A> methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: Usando o BeginInit e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A>métodos impede que o controle que está sendo usada antes de ser totalmente inicializado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the grid's border style.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo da borda da grade.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref> valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_FixedSingle" name="FixedSingle" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_FixedSingle" name="FixedSingle" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BorderStyle*> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BorderStyle*>mudou.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BorderStyle*>

trans-unit.source: Possible values include `None`, `FixedSingle`, and `Fixed3D`.
trans-unit.target: Os valores possíveis incluem `None`, `FixedSingle`, e `Fixed3D`.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the current edit operation and rolls back all changes.
trans-unit.target: Cancela a operação de edição atual e reverte todas as alterações.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the caption area.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de plano de fundo da área de legenda.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the caption's background color.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor de plano de fundo da legenda.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.ActiveCaption*> color.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.ActiveCaption*>cor.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.ActiveCaption*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the grid's caption.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a fonte da legenda da grade.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Font> encapsulates a Windows font and provides the methods for manipulating that font.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Drawing.Font>encapsula uma fonte do Windows e fornece métodos para manipular a essa fonte.</xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that represents the caption's font.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> que representa a fonte da legenda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the caption area.

trans-unit.source: If CaptionVisible is `false`, the **Back** button, **ParentRow** button, and caption will not be seen.
trans-unit.target: Se for CaptionVisible `false`, o **novamente** botão, **ParentRow** botão e a legenda não serão exibida.

trans-unit.source: Because navigation is limited, links to child tables will also not be visible and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A> will be set to `None`.
trans-unit.target: Como a navegação é limitada, links para tabelas filho também não estarão visíveis e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A>será definida como `None`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A>

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que define o local da coluna editada.

trans-unit.source: When called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A> method enables the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control to show a pencil in the row header.
trans-unit.target: Quando chamado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A>método habilita o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controle para mostrar um lápis no cabeçalho da linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A>

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new instance of the accessibility object for this control.
trans-unit.target: Constrói uma nova instância do objeto de acessibilidade para este controle.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes should not call the base class's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas não devem chamar a classe base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only the following properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> should be set: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Role%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Description%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Name%2A> All other properties are handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> itself.
trans-unit.target: As seguintes propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>deve ser definido:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Role%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Description%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Name%2A>todas as outras propriedades são manipuladas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>em si.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Description%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Role%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para definir o estilo de coluna como padrão. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
